attributes.action: Introduce Albanian language as a GCSE and A Level
attributes.additional_details: Ethnic Albanians are spread across the entirety of Europe and beyond, with significant populations in UK whereby we want to learn more about our language
attributes.background: A study of ‘shqip’ opens up endless possibilities and opportunities. A rich and sophisticated language, spoken in many varieties throughout Albania.
